languages.text: "Смирение — удел покорных. Я же — вестница великих перемен, и видения грядущих великих катаклизмов выжгли из моего сердца смирение".
"Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."
languages.original_text: "Смирение — удел покорных. Я же — вестница великих перемен, и видения грядущих великих катаклизмов выжгли из моего сердца смирение".

traits.locale_text: "Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."
"Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."
"Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."
"Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."
"Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."
"Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."

languages.text: "Demut ist das Los der Schwachen. Ich bin eine Botin großer Veränderungen, und Visionen der großen Katastrophen, die da kommen werden, haben alle Demut in meinem Herzen eingeäschert."
languages.original_text: "Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."

traits.locale_text: "Demut ist das Los der Schwachen. Ich bin eine Botin großer Veränderungen, und Visionen der großen Katastrophen, die da kommen werden, haben alle Demut in meinem Herzen eingeäschert."

languages.text: « L'humilité est le lot des dociles. Je suis annonciatrice de grands changements et les visions des catastrophes à venir ont calciné l'humilité qui subsistait dans mon cœur. »
languages.original_text: "Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."

traits.locale_text: « L'humilité est le lot des dociles. Je suis annonciatrice de grands changements et les visions des catastrophes à venir ont calciné l'humilité qui subsistait dans mon cœur. »

languages.text: “谦卑只属于那些温顺羔羊，而我是伟大变革的先驱。当我亲眼预见即将到来的伟大灾变时，我心中的谦卑早已烧作了灰烬。”
languages.original_text: "Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."

traits.locale_text: “谦卑只属于那些温顺羔羊，而我是伟大变革的先驱。当我亲眼预见即将到来的伟大灾变时，我心中的谦卑早已烧作了灰烬。”

languages.text: 「謙虚であることは意気地がないに等しい。私は大きな変化の開拓者で、これから起こる大災害のビジョンが、心の中にあった謙虚さを消し去った」
languages.original_text: "Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."

traits.locale_text: 「謙虚であることは意気地のない奴だ。私は大きな変化の開拓者で、これから起こる大災害のビジョンが、心の中にあった謙虚さを消し去った」

languages.text: «La humildad es el destino de los sumisos. Soy heraldo de grandes cambios, y las visiones de los grandes cataclismos venideros han incinerado la humildad que tenía en mi corazón».
languages.original_text: "Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."

traits.locale_text: «La humildad es el destino de los sumisos. Soy heraldo de grandes cambios, y las visiones de los grandes cataclismos venideros han incinerado la humildad que tenía en mi corazón».

languages.text: "Boyun eğmek, koyunlara özgüdür. Ben, muazzam bir değişimin müjdecisiyim. Yaklaşan büyük felaketlerin görüleri, kalbimdeki tevazuyu yakıp kül etti."
languages.original_text: "Humility is the lot of the meek. I am a harbinger of great changes, and visions of the great cataclysms to come have incinerated what humility I had in my heart."

traits.locale_text: "Boyun eğmek, koyunlara özgüdür. Ben, muazzam bir değişimin müjdecisiyim. Yaklaşan felaketlerin görüleri, kalbimdeki tevazuyu yakıp kül etti."
